[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1633683583305{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tour style=”modern” shape=”round” color=”blue” controls_size=”sm” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Home” tab_id=”1633683567470-5b0a7e35-f43b” el_class=”list-3″][vc_custom_heading text=”About the Department” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633688298305{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The department was started in the year 2008 with three dual degree programmes namely M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering, M.Tech. in Information Technology and M.Tech. in Software Engineering, PG programme namely M.E. in Computer Science & Engineering (FT&PT) and Ph.D. Programmes. There were no further intakes for dual degree programmes after 2009. UG courses namely B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering and B.Tech. in Information Technology were started in the year 2010 with an approved intake of sixty in each. However, there was no further intake for the UG and PG programmes after 2013 and 2018 respectively. At present, the department offers B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering and Ph.d programmes (in both FT & PT modes). The Department is blessed with a band of twelve dedicated faculty members who are entrusted with the great task of molding the young minds and carrying out research in the areas of Internet of Things, Data Analytics, Image processing, Data Mining, Wireless Networks, Cloud Computing, etc. The training of the mind, heart and the will of our young students have been accepted as our educational endeavor.

The Department is equipped with two labs to cater to the needs of the students. Ample opportunities are provided to equip the students be it a class room, lecture or group discussion, a project work or a field trip, a curricular assignment or co-curricular activity. In the entire learning and growing process, our aim and objectives have been consistently kept in mind. The faculty members guide the students to acquire correct values and develop wholesome attitudes in order to achieve a harmonious blending of the human values with knowledge.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Vision” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633688320768{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • To strive to develop a continuous pursuit of excellence in high quality IT education & computer science expertise.
  • To produce skilled and trained engineering manpower with string ethical and moral background for the growing technological & socioeconomic needs of our nation.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Mission” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633688354824{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • Motivate & prepare the students for successful IT careers with strong technical, moral & ethical skills.
  • Create a work culture where teacher enjoys facilitation and learner enjoys learning for Research & Development as well as takes initiatives.
  • Collaborate with industry and research institutes to meet the changing needs of society.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Courses” tab_id=”1633683567474-d3ff235b-5976″][vc_custom_heading text=”Courses Offered” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • B.E Computer Science and Engineering
  • Ph.D. programmes (FT & PT)

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Gallery” tab_id=”1633683700340-196a11ec-15de”][vc_single_image image=”934″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Consultancy Projects” tab_id=”1633683714269-2fe6198a-1cdc”][vc_btn title=”Download Now” color=”pink” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-file-pdf-o” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmywebspace.in%2Fauttvl%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2021%2F10%2FConsultancy_CSE.pdf||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Programmes Organized” tab_id=”1633689185187-030b7a5b-e011″][vc_custom_heading text=”Faculty training and Development Programmes” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689466353{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • Seven Day Faculty Development Programme on “Theory of Computation” conducted from 29th April to 05th May 2019 sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai.
  • Seven Day Faculty Development Programme on Distributed System conducted from 27th November to 3rd December 2017 sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai.
  • A 7 day FDTP on CS6801-Multicore Architecture and Programming sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai was organized by the department from 1st to 5th and 9th to 10th Dec 2016.
  • A 7 day FDTP on IT6702 Data Warehousing and Data Mining sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai was organized by the department from 25th to 31st May 2016.
  • Seven Day Faculty Development Programme on “Databases Management Systems and Advanced Databases conducted during 4th – 10th December 2013 and sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai.
  • Seven Day Faculty Development Programme on “Mobile and Pervasive Computing” conducted during 4th – 10th June 2013 and sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai.
  • Seven Day Faculty Development Programme on “Digital Image Processing” conducted during 7th – 13th December 2012 and sponsored by Centre for Faculty Development, Anna University, Chennai.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Workshops” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689471913{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • Two Day Hands-on Workshop on Python Programming organized by the Director, Academic Courses and Sponsored by the Director, CFD from 21-08-2017 to 22-08- 2017.
  • Two Day Workshop on Cloud OpenStack Kilo11, on 29th and 30th October 2015.
  • Two Day Workshop on Hands on approach to Proficient Document Writing using LATEX” conducted during 12th – 13th October 2013.
  • Two week ISTE Workshop on “Database Management Systems” funded by IIT Bombay conducted during 21st –31st May 2013.
  • Two Day Workshop on Hands on Approach to Wireless Network Simulation using NS2 conducted during 4th – 5th December 2012.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Conferences” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689480561{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • CSIR Sponsored National Conference on Computing and Communication NCCC’15 organized jointly by the Department of CSE and ECE from 4th to 5th May 2015.
  • International Workshop and Conference on “Research Contributions in Technology and Applications “, 27th – 28th March 2015.
  • National Conference on Computing and Communication NCCC’14 organized jointly by the Department of CSE and ECE from 3rd to 4th April 2014.
  • National Conference NACET 2011 organized jointly by all the Departments conducted on 6th May 2011 at Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Symposiums” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689490984{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]The Student’s technical association TECH SOCIETY organized

  • An Inter college Symposium NOVATEUR 2013 on 4th October 2013.
  • A Two day Intra College Symposium TECHNOPS – 2K19 conducted on March 14th & 15th 2019.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Other Programmes” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689499136{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • A 5 day Computer Training Programme for the Staff of Police Department was conducted free of cost from 15th to 19th June 2015. Training was offered on Computer Fundamentals, Working with Windows 8.1 and Microsoft Package. 30 staff of the police department were benefitted out of it.
  • A 5 day Computer Training Programme for the Students from Government Schools was conducted free of cost from 15th to 19th June 2015. Sixty students from government schools participated in the programme. Training was offered on Computer Fundamentals, and Microsoft Package.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Research” tab_id=”1633689546222-65b8a6ab-2e1d”][vc_custom_heading text=”Publications” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689744192{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Patents Filled” tab_id=”1633689804904-dfbfafd1-901d”][vc_custom_heading text=”Patents Filled” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689850680{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • Indian Patent Application No. 201641043187A – A Non Invasive Naadi Parisothanai Device for Prognosis or Diagnosis of Diseases from the after-effect of Electrical Impulse at the Heart in the Radial Artery is under examination after initial screening.
  • Indian Patent Application No. 201741028756 – A Smart Toll Collection System utilizing Industrial Scientific Medical Band of Radio Frequency Communication is filed under initial screening.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Books / Book Chapters” tab_id=”1633689864856-37571f27-2cd0″][vc_custom_heading text=”Books / Book Chapters” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689970040{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • Dr. Dejey and Dr. S. Murugan, “Computer Forensics”, First Edition, Oxford University Press(India), July 2018.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Students Achievements” tab_id=”1633689934038-39535048-f4ef”][vc_custom_heading text=”Achievements” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633689961833{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

  • A Project Work on “Mobile Customization for intimating location information and profile changing” by M.Ajmal Nisha and M.Viji of B.Tech Information Technology (2011-2015) won the First Prize in a Two Day Project Expo – Engineering Future India organized jointly by KKNPP and Regional Office, Anna University Tirunelveli
  • A Project Work on “Development of Hardware for Naadi Pariksha” by M. Kaviya Elakkiya of M.E (CSE) (2014-2016) won the First Prize in the Techno Fair organized by the District Science Centre, Tirunelveli.
  • A Project Work on “Development of Hardware for Naadi Pariksha” by M. Kaviya Elakkiya of M.E (CSE) (2014-2016) won the First Prize in the District Level Skill Summit 2017 organized by Department of Labor Development and Training, Government of TamilNadu.
  • A Project Work on “Development of Low Cost Device for assisting Fishermen” by Antony Sahaya Jensy of M.E (2016-2018) won the Second Prize in the District Level Skill Summit 2017 organized by Department of Labor Development and Training, Government of TamilNadu.
  • A Project Work titled “IoT based System for Banana Plantation Monitoring and Disease Detection” by Jemima of M.E. (2015 – 2017) won a Cash Award of Rs.10,000/- by Tamil Nadu State Council for Science and Technology (TNSCST) under the Student Project Scheme (SPS).
  • A Project Work titled “IoT based System for Banana Plantation Monitoring and Disease Detection” by Jemima of M.E. (2015 – 2017) won the Best Project Award in the Project Exhibition organized by Tamil Nadu State Council for Science and Technology (TNSCST) at GCT, Coimbatore.
  • Prabhu of B.Tech Information Technology (2012 -2016) received the Best Project Award at the Project Expo held at District Science Centre for his project titled “Smart Walking Stick”.
  • A Project Work on “Low memory Device enhancer with battery saver” by John Linga durai, T.Tamilarasan and G. Vel Murugan of B.Tech Information Technology (2012-2016) won the Second Prize in a Two Day Project Expo – Engineering Future India organized jointly by KKNPP and Regional Office, Anna University Tirunelveli.
  • A Project Work on ” Palmleaf Character Recognition ” by Savitha of B.Tech Information Technology (2011-2015) won the First Prize in a Two Day Project Expo – Engineering Future India organized jointly by KKNPP and Regional Office, Anna University Tirunelveli

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Rank Holders” tab_id=”1633690073848-15493496-65fb”][vc_custom_heading text=”Rank Holders” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633690093768{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]
